name: @streamr-contracts/network-subgraphs
description: Subgraph definitions for the streamr contracts

scripts.build: ./scripts/copyAbisFromContractsPackage.sh && npm run codegen && npm run graphbuild
scripts.docker:buildLocalArch: npm run build && cp subgraph_dev2.yaml subgraph.yaml && docker build . -t streamr/deploy-network-subgraphs:dev-fastchain
scripts.docker:buildMultiArchAndPush: npm run build && cp subgraph_dev2.yaml subgraph.yaml && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 . -t streamr/deploy-network-subgraphs:dev-fastchain --push
